items.title: Many of the impacted families who are in the solidarity meals...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Many of the impacted families who are in the solidarity meals program are going through difficult days, this week we will not have food but we will catch up next week. keep supporting us week after week!! Thanks

items.title: ï¿¼ Today and through the week our staff and allies across TX...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

ï¿¼
Today and through the week our staff and allies across TX will be participating in 24-hour fasting to answer Black Alliance for Just Immigration's call for a national week in support of Black migrants. Join us at http://txcivilrights.org/24hourfast to show your support. #DefendBlackImmigrants

Immigrants are so often treated with violence and indignity, and Black immigrants even more so. The data of greater deportations/criminalization of Black migrants is clear in BAJIâ€™s S...tate of Black Immigrants report, available here: https://bit.ly/BAJIsobi2018.

This week, Black-led organizations like BAJI, Haitian Bridge Alliance, and The Sidewalk School for Children Asylum Seekers are leading the national movement to call for ending Title 42. You can learn more at http://nomoredeportations.org and http://bit.ly/NWAPartnerToolkitâ€¦ to join in. Follow these groups to stay tuned.

We understand that fasting is not an option for everyone. Weâ€™re also asking folks to call their Representative and demand they uplift Black-led orgs during this time, and support legislation to end anti-Black legislation like Title 42.

Black migrants already fast and do all they can to protest horrendous detention conditions. Black-led orgs are leading us in this moment, and we must now join in and contribute to ending anti-Blackness however we can. Join the fast: http://txcivilrightsproject.org/24hourfast

See More

items.title: Sanctuary4All Colorado+4Denver CommunistsHundreds participated in the the 20th anniversary of the Four Directions All Nations March 2021...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado+4Denver Communists

Hundreds participated in the the 20th anniversary of the Four Directions All Nations March 2021 last night in Denver. It was the first March since Columbus Day ...was eliminated as a holiday last year in Colorado. (In 1907, Colorado was the first state to make it an official holiday.)

The four marches started at four different locations and convened at Cuernavaca Park, the site of a Cheyenne and Arapaho camp. We marched from the west direction, which was intended to honor Rita Martinez, a Chicano activist from Pueblo who spent decades fighting police brutality and the observance of Columbus Day.

We marched with our comrades who have dedicated their lives to fighting the police and borders, including those with Native Lives Matter 5280, Frontline Party for Revolutionary Action - FPRA, and Sanctuary4All Colorado. And we carried the flags of Palestine and the Mapuche, two Indigenous nations fighting against the police and the colonial imposition of borders.

See More

Yessenia and Carlos recently had their first third child, so theyâ€™re team cooking this weekend to balance work and caring for the new baby. You can order burritos from them at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

items.title: "When we fight and create, we say to our fallen companeros,...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

"When we fight and create, we say to our fallen companeros, 'you did not die when they killed you." -Eduardo Galleano

Join us for the 20th anniversary of the Four Directions All Nations March to celebrate the abolishment of Columbus day, to honor our Indigenous relatives who are still resisting the violence of colonialism and genocide, and to remember that we were once free Peoples, and we will be free again.

items.title: Yesterday myfriend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Yesterday myfriend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having two delicate surgeries done at the same time, one to treat a hernia and the other to treat cancer in her kidney. She is an immigrant mother who has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills for the anesthesia. Weâ€™re asking for community to support her so we can take a little stress off her life. We are also asking for you to keep her in your thoughts and prayers today. Her family is so grateful for the community support. https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-â€¦

items.title: Today our friend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Today our friend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having two delicate surgeries done at the same time, one to treat a hernia and the other to treat cancer in her kidney. She is an immigrant mother who has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills for the anesthesia. Weâ€™re asking for community to support her so we can take a little stress off her life. We are also asking for you to keep her in your thoughts and prayers today. Her family is so grateful for the community support. https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-â€¦

items.title: Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be entering surgery. She will be having 2 surgeries done at the same time that are very delicate, one hernia and cancer in a kidney. She is an immigrant mother that has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills. We ask the help of the community to help her so we could take off a little stress off her life. We are also asking for support that it all goes well, her family will be very grateful that the community will give this support.

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Please share an suport

For the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. Itâ€™s beâ€¦ Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment

gofundme.com
